item.name: task#6ZDMn78O
item.description: As an owner, I can update the details of my advertised apartments and/or flatshares.

item.name: task#6tPXQXYt
item.description: As an admin, I can delete ads.

item.name: task#72UbWMdC
item.description: As a visitor, I can view the homepage so that I can browse through the ads of the apartments.

item.name: task#94QPpuuS
item.description: As a visitor, I can filter out the listings according to the ratings so that I can narrow down the search.

item.name: task#A2HptW5z
item.description: As a student, I can send rent requests to apartment's owner.

item.name: task#BJMOlLUK
item.description: As a visitor, I can search for an apartment and/or a room using specific keywords.

item.name: task#Cy58S6oe
item.description: As a registered user, I can login using my previously registered email so that I can access my account.

item.name: task#F2Q7vW8G
item.description: As a visitor, I can access the specific pages of rentables so that I can view more details (excluding classified info such as: address or contact info).

item.name: task#F4At6Rci
item.description: As a registered user, I can add my university email or a photo of university id so that I can confirm my identity as a student.

item.name: task#VhzRSHQN
item.description: As a visitor, I can filter out the listings according to location so that I can narrow down the search.

item.name: task#ddpoJIrh
item.description: As a visitor, I can view the ratings and reviews of other clients on the rentables so that I have a broader idea about the conditions of the rentables.

item.name: task#eXM89GXB
item.description: As a registered user, I can add favorites to my list of favorite rooms and apartments

item.name: task#fUzoZgXZ
item.description: As a visitor, I can filter out the listings according to the price so that I can narrow down the search.

item.name: task#hYekjQLz
item.description: As a student, I can review the rentables I've rented so that I can reflect on my experience.

item.name: task#wm24mh5X
item.description: As a registered user, I can add my university email or a photo of university id so that I can confirm my identity as a student.

item.name: task#zVxcNc0Y
item.description: As a visitor, I can register through my personal email so that I can have an account.
